ch.epfl.lis.wingj.expression

Class CircularExpressionMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.ImagePlus
      • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.expression.CircularExpressionMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ij.measure.Measurements, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class CircularExpressionMap
extends ij.ImagePlus
    Represents an individual or circular expression map.
    Version:
    March 26, 2012
    Author:
    Ricard Delgado-Gonzalo (ricard.delg...@gmail.com), Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ij.process.FloatProcessor computeExpressionMap(ij.ImagePlus expression, Structure structure, Grid grid, int projectionMode)
      Returns the circular expression map oriented in the canonical position for a particular projection mode.

      Returns the circular sampling density map oriented in the canonical position for a particular projection mode.
      static void reorientExpressionMap(ij.process.FloatProcessor fp, Grid grid, Structure structure, int projectionMode)
      Rotates and flips the expression map to the canonical orientation.
      static ij.process.FloatProcessor transformSquared2CircularExpressionMap(ij.process.FloatProcessor fp)
      Transforms the squared expression map to a circular one by compressing in the horizontal dimension.
